turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a pizza from Tommy's Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large Supreme Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately, they are out of that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh okay, than how about a large with sausage and pepperoni and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are out of pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, how about a large pizza with sausage, onion, and garlic?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, they are out of garlic.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, unlucky day for me. How about a large pizza with onions and sausage then?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I ordered a large pizza with onion and sausage for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready for pick up in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, have a great day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too!
